fill_in_the_blanks.question: Sinson was a hyena who had changed into a person
When Kalabushe arrived, the house was very quiet
Kalabushe kept talking even when she was inside Sinson's stomach

meanings.blanket: a large piece of woollen or similar material used as a covering on a bed
meanings.talkative: fond of or given to talking
meanings.valley: a low area of land between hills or mountains
meanings.warn: inform someone in advance of a possible danger

meanings.rescue: save someone from a dangerous or difficult situation
meanings.stomach: the internal organ in which the major part of the digestion of food occurs
meanings.surprise: an unexpected or astonishing event, fact
meanings.tired: in need of sleep or rest

multiple_choice.question: What sort of girl was Kalabushe?
